Detailed Description

General definition of image contains pixels in regular grid.

All pixels are using the same number of color components.

Definition at line 19 of file IRasterImage.h.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void iimg::IRasterImage::ClearImage ( )
pure virtual

Cleat this image.

After this operation all the image pixels will be set to the default value (black by default).

Implemented in iimg::CScanlineMask, iimg::CBitmap, and iimg::CGeneralBitmap.

virtual icmm::CVarColor iimg::IRasterImage::GetColorAt ( const istd::CIndex2d &  position) const
pure virtual

Get color at specified pixel.

Parameters
positionpixel position, must be inside of returned size.

Implemented in iimg::CScanlineMask, iimg::CBitmap, and iimg::CBitmapBase.

pure virtual

Implemented in iimg::CScanlineMask, iimg::CBitmap, and iimg::CGeneralBitmap.

Implemented in iimg::CScanlineMask, iimg::CBitmap, and iimg::CGeneralBitmap.

virtual bool iimg::IRasterImage::IsEmpty ( ) const
pure virtual

Return true if this image is empty.

Implemented in iimg::CScanlineMask, and iimg::CBitmapBase.

virtual void iimg::IRasterImage::ResetImage ( )
pure virtual

Reset this image.

After this operation image is set to initial state.

Implemented in iimg::CScanlineMask, iimg::CBitmap, and iimg::CGeneralBitmap.

const icmm::CVarColor &  color 
)
pure virtual

Set color at specified pixel.

Parameters
positionpixel position, must be inside of returned size.
colorcolor of pixel will be set.
Returns
true, if pixel color was changed.
